radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver echotexture is normal; no intrahepatic bile duct dilation. A well-circumscribed hyperechoic right hepatic lesion measuring 2.6 x 2.4 x 2.4 cm is predominately hyperechoic but heterogeneous in echotexture. The main portal vein is patent. The CBD measures 2 mm. The gallbladder contains multiple mobile stones measuring up to 1.4 cm. There is no pericholecystic fluid, wall thickening, distention, or sonographic Murphy sign. No free fluid is present. The right kidney appears normal. The pancreas is unremarkable. The aorta is normal in caliber.
